name: Nokia Series 40 Theme File
summary: Learn about .NTH files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NTH files are distributed in a compressed .ZIP format. Therefore, you can rename their extension to ".zip" and open them with any Zip decompression utility.

description: An NTH file contains a theme used for customizing the look and feel of a Nokia Series 40 mobile phone. It includes background images, icons, ringtones, and other custom options. NTH files are created using the Nokia Series 40 Theme Studio application.
